data.title: Bigg Boss 11: Hiten Tejwani's wife Gauri Pradhan slams Hina Khan for calling her husband 'spineless' (watch video)
meta_keywords: bigg boss 11 gauri pradhan hina khan fight
bigg boss 11 gauri hina fight video
data.meta_description: Hiten Tejwani's wife Gauri Pradhan entered the house as a part of the ongoing task on Bigg Boss 11 where a family member of every housemate is giving them a surprise visit.
data.text:
Hina Khan recently created a buzz on the show when she sparked a feud with Hiten Tejwani. The television actress was quite miffed with Hiten for following Vikas Gupta and eliminating her from the captaincy task.

Infuriated with Hiten's behavior, Hina ended up yelling at him and even called him a spineless person. While her reaction did invite her a lot of criticism from the audience, Hiten's wife Gauri is also upset with Hina's statement.

As per the media reports, Gauri Pradhan, who will be entering the BB house, will be seen lashing out at the Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai actress.

Gauri will tell Hina that Hiten is playing the game pretty well and he doesn't need to be advised at every step. She also stated, "The message which I had sent about being a leader and not a follower was for Hiten and not for everyone else to analyze it. It was a personal message."

Gauri also expressed her disappointment towards Akash Dadlani's changed game. Notably, Gauri's visit to the house indeed made Hiten breakdown into tears. However, he is not able to express his feelings to his lady love as he is in freeze mode.

While Hiten is all teary-eyed, it will be interesting to see how Hina will react to Gauri's stern reaction.
